topic: participants needed for an HDR experiment
body:
Dear Friends and Colleagues,


We are conducting a research on the quality of high dynamic range (HDR)
deghosting algorithms. We would greatly appreciate if you can take our
experiment at the following link:


http://www.ceng.metu.edu.tr/~tarhan/dgexp


Thank you all for your contribution,
Ahmet Oğuz Akyüz
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/hdri/2015-May/000558.html).</sup>
